alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Cumberland; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CHESTERFIELD...EAST CENTRAL CUMBERLAND...SOUTHERN GOOCHLAND...WEST CENTRAL HENRICO... NORTHWESTERN AMELIA AND POWHATAN COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Trenholm to near Morven to Jetersville. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Powhatan, Amelia Courthouse, and Macon around 625 PM EDT. Chula around 635 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Crozier, Rock Castle, Pilkinton, Winterham, Skinquarter, Fine Creek Mills, Michaux, West View, Holly Hills, and Lodore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Amelia; Cumberland; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
